section.title: Set a volume to read-only access
section.para: To give multiple users shared, secure access to the same data, you can set a volume to read-only access.
Run the following command to set a volume to read-only access:
VOLUME is the ID of the target volume and BOOLEAN is a flag that enables read-only or read/write access to the volume.
The following values for BOOLEAN are valid:

listitem.para: true. Sets the read-only flag in the volume. When you attach the volume to an instance, the instance checks for this flag to determine whether to restrict volume access to read-only.
false. Sets the volume to read/write access.
